components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description: A circle shown with a diagonal arrow pointing out the top-right, used as a representation for men.
components.title: Male Sign

description: The male version of the üëÆ Police Officer emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

bn:00091483v: Maintain the security of by carrying out a patrol

bn:00091144v: Direct or command as an officer

bn:00054972n: Any person in the armed services who holds a position of authority or command
Any person in the armed services who holds a position of authority or command.
An officer is a member of an armed force or uniformed service who holds a position of authority.
Member of an armed force or uniformed service who holds a position of authority

bn:00022026n: A police force is a constituted body of persons empowered by the state to enforce the law, protect property, and limit civil disorder.
A civil force granted the legal authority to enforce the law and maintain public order.
Constabulary may have several definitions: A civil, non-paramilitary force consisting of police officers called constables.
Branch of the government which is charged with the preservation of public order, the promotion of public health and safety, and the prevention, detection, and punishment of crimes.
The force of policemen and officers
Constituted body of persons empowered by the state to enforce the law
An organisation that enforces the law.
With `old bill' as a slang term in the UK

bn:00058698n: A member of a police force
A member of a police force, especially one who is male.
An officer of a law enforcement agency.
A police officer is a warranted employee of a police force.
A police officer, especially a junior one who does patrol instead of detection or supervising other policemen.
A police officer or prison guard.
Warranted employee of a police force
An officer in a law enforcement agency.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)
